channel.title: Comments on: T-SQL Tuesday #25: T-SQL Tricks – Checking Transaction Log Space Used
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Greg Lucas
item.dc:creator: Greg Lucas
item.description: Jes, I like this tip. I have something similar using SQLPERF but will add the additional elements you have to my version. Thanks. BTW what plugin are you using to prettify your T-SQL (it works better than the one I use)
item.content:encoded: Jes, I like this tip. I have something similar using SQLPERF but will add the additional elements you have to my version. Thanks. BTW what plugin are you using to prettify your T-SQL (it works better than the one I use)
